committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District in the State of Alabama, and for other purposes.
short_title: Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District Act of 1993

summary.text: Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District Act of 1993 - Establishes within Walker, Tuscaloosa, Shelby, Jefferson, and Bibb counties, Alabama, the Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District for preserving and interpreting the educational and historical significance of the natural, historical, cultural, and recreational resources in the Birmingham District within such counties. Establishes the Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District Commission to prepare and submit for approval by the Secretary of the Interior a heritage management plan for the District. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District Act of 1993
To establish the Birmingham National Industrial Heritage District in the State of Alabama, and for other purposes.
